column1: #Text=Katara says : " So , how long do you think it 's been since someone was here ? "
#Text=Sokka says : " Long enough for moss to grow on the hull .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I wonder why they left this boat ?
#Text=" Aang says : " When was the last time you saw your dad ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " I do n't want to talk about it .
#Text=I did n't mean to bring that up .
#Text=Our dad left about two years ago , with all the other Water Tribe men .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Maybe we should all get some sleep .
#Text=" Main Aang Appa Bato Katara Sokka Antagonists Iroh June Nyla Zuko says : " Minor Momo Hakoda Herbalist Miyuki Mother Superior Nuns at the abbey Wu " Toph says : " No !
